page.title: 10UPHAM YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Upham Youth Club is for 9-13 year olds. The youngsters play things such as swingball, which is a ball on the end of a stick. On top of that is twisted a coil of metal. The ball is fixed to the end of a piece of rope, the other end of which is fastened by a metal ring to the metal coil. When the ball is hit with a bat it goes round and round, making the ring go up or down the metal coil, depending on which way the ball is hit. Two people play, one up and one down; the winner is the one who makes the ring reach his "goal" first. Other games are played as well, and there is a tuck shop in which people can buy sweets and soft drinks. There are four Leaders.Sometimes members go on outings, have barbecues and go swimming.
